annotation_sentence: Hello! I am, um, little nervous. But everyone nice.

annotation_sentence: Yes, I am ready. Please tell me.

annotation_sentence: Uh, not yet. I see the system, but not use it yet.

annotation_sentence: Okay, I understand. I feel better now.

annotation_sentence: I can start today. After lunch, maybe?
